Unbuffed: Show stats for the minion instead of the player.
无增益效果: 显示召唤物的数据而不是玩家的。

Unbuffed: This controls the calculation of the stats shown in this tab.
无增益效果: 这控制了该选项卡中显示的统计数据的计算。

Unbuffed: The stats in the sidebar are always shown in Effective DPS mode, regardless of this setting.
无增益效果: 侧边栏中的统计数据总是以有效DPS模式显示，无论此设置如何。

Unbuffed: Unbuffed: No auras, buffs, or other support skills or effects will apply. This is equivalent to standing in town.
无增益效果: 无增益效果: 无光环丶增益效果丶其他辅助技能效果影响。等效于站在城镇地图中时的状态。

Unbuffed: Buffed: Aura and buff skills apply. This is equivalent to standing in your hideout with auras and buffs turned on.
无增益效果: 有增益效果: 受到光环丶增益效果影响。等效于站在藏身处中时的状态。

Unbuffed: In Combat: Charges and combat buffs such as Onslaught will also apply. This will show your character sheet stats in combat.
无增益效果: 战斗状态: 受到充能球和战斗BUFF如【猛攻】的影响。这将表现你的人物在战斗中的统计数据。

Unbuffed: Effective DPS: Curses and enemy properties (such as resistances and status conditions) will also apply. This estimates your true DPS.
无增益效果: 有效 DPS: 受到诅咒和敌人属性(例如敌人的抗性和状态条件)影响。这表现了估算出的你的真实DPS。
